body: A large building to house armies, train guards, and recruit militias; it is larger and more versatile than a Barracks.
name: Garrison
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Downtime/Buildings And Organizations/Buildings and Organizations/Buildings/Garrison
rooms: 4 Armories, 2 Bedrooms, 4 Bunks, 1 Common Room, 1 Dojo, 1 Guard Post, 1 Infirmary, 1 Kitchen, 1 Lavatory, 2 Offices, 2 Storages
